name: Parkour Operation
description:
Avoid lava balls and collect all of the golden points

WASD to move

Space to jump

Shift to sprint (recommended)

For the best experience download the game

V0.1 uploaded on 25.1.2023

V0.2 uploaded on 26.1.2023

This is my project for the 12th (last) lesson in my first unity course by Gavriel Ankri
